examples.teaser:
Prototype a simple consumption tracking app to accompany the new heat-not-burn device.
The first tests suggested iteration with more of an emphasis on pleasure than health.
A card insert in each pack with a built in RFID chip that links to an online subscription page when a consumer taps their mobile on it or send an SMS to know more.
Building an improved sales rep / kiosk promo management / mobile app toolkit with a connected device (Deal box) that encourages and rewards kiosks owners for “switching” clients.
Build a prototype ibeacon enabled mobile app that demonstrated how a location enabled vending machine could create a more delightful and personalised vending experience.
